title: Root schema.
description: A schema to validate cricket events

eventType.title: EventType schema.
eventType.description: Validates the type of events that can be sent

timestamp.title: Timestamp schema.
timestamp.description: The timestamp when the event occurred as a ISO8601 datetime with timezone

ball.title: Ball schema.
ball.description: Describes which ball in the game a match event relates to

battingTeam.title: BattingTeam schema.
battingTeam.description: The team who is currently batting

id.title: BattingTeam Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the currently batting team

name.title: BattingTeam Name schema.
name.description: The full name of the team batting.

fieldingTeam.title: FieldingTeam schema.
fieldingTeam.description: The team that is currently fielding.

id.title: FieldingTeam Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the currently fielding team.

name.title: FieldingTeam Name schema.
name.description: An name for the currently fielding team.

innings.title: Innings schema.
innings.description: An identifier for which innings in a match this event relates to

over.title: Over schema.
over.description: The over which this match event belongs to.

ball.title: Ball schema.
ball.description: The ball in the over which this match event belongs to.

runs.title: Runs schema.
runs.description: The number of physical runs taken by the batsman.

batsmen.title: Batsmen schema.
batsmen.description: Describes the batsman relating to this match event.

striker.title: Striker schema.
striker.description: Describes the batsman that is currently facing the match event.

id.title: Striker Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the batsman currently on strike.

name.title: Striker Name schema.
name.description: The name of the batsman currently on strike.

nonStriker.title: NonStriker schema.
nonStriker.description: An identifier for the batsman not currently on strike.

id.title: NonStriker Id schema.
id.description: An identifer for the batsman not currently on strike.

name.title: NonStriker Name schema.
name.description: A name for the batsman not currently on strike.

bowler.title: Bowler schema.
bowler.description: Describes the bowler of the match event.

id.title: Bowler Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the bowler of the match event.

name.title: Bowler Name schema.
name.description: A name for the bowler of the match event.

fielder.title: Fielder schema.
fielder.description: Describes the fielder of the match event.

id.title: Fielder Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the fielder of the match event.

name.title: Fielder Name schema.
name.description: A name for the fielder of the match event.

batsman.title: Batsman schema.
batsman.description: Describes the batsman of the match event.

id.title: Batsman Id schema.
id.description: An identifier for the batsman of the match event.

name.title: Batsman Name schema.
name.description: A name for the batsman of the match event.
